text: No minor under 18 years of age shall be employed, permitted, or suffered to work at operating any freight or nonautomatic elevator, or in any quarry, tunnel, or excavation.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 36-505.

1973 Ed., § 36-205.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-68, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-201.

DC CODE § 32-205

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Employment of minors under 18 years of age in certain occupations prohibited.
